DOC.HEADLINE: ' 94 WINTER_OLYMPICS / LILLEHAMMER ; NOTEBOOK
DOC.TEXT: Germany took an early lead , hit every target at the shooting range and cruised to its second consecutive gold medal in the men ' s biathlon relay . Ricco Gross , Frank Luck , Mark Kirchner and Sven Fischer finished the 30-kilometer race in 1 hour 30 minutes 22.1 seconds . The Russians were second in the ski-and-shoot event , 61.5 seconds behind , and France was third , 2:09.2 behind .
